title: Subchapter D - Equipment
content:
Subchapter D - Equipment

State Regulations

Part 41 - Standards Of Brake Efficiency (§ 41.1 to 41.2)

Part 42 - Hydraulic Brake Fluid (§ 42.1 to 42.4)

Part 43 - Motor Vehicle Lighting (§ 43.1 to 43.10)

Part 44 - Colored Lights (§ 44.1 to 44.6)

Part 45 - Emergency Lighting Equipment (§ 45.1 to 45.5)

Part 46 - School Bus Equipment (§ 46.1 to 46.13)

Part 47 - Splash Guards (§ 47.1 to 47.6)

Part 48 - Transportation Of Logs And Other Materials (§ 48.1 to 48.7)

Part 49 - Seat Safety Belts And Shoulder Harness Safety Belts (§ 49.1 to 49.6)

Part 50 - Protective Helmets For In-line Skaters, Bicyclists And Operators Of Scooters (§ 50.1 to 50.2)

Part 51 - Tires (§ 51.1 to 51.8)

Part 52 - Traffic Hazard Warning Devices (§ 52.1 to 52.5)

Part 53 - Brake Linings (§ 53.1 to 53.11)

Part 54 - Protective Helmets, Goggles, Face Shields, Light Transmittance for Motor Vehicle Windows and Windshields and Wind Screens for Motorcycles

Part 55 - Padded Equipment (§ 55.1 to 55.5)

Part 56 - Safety Equipment Exemptions (§ 56.1 to 56.12)

Part 57 - Trailer Hitches (§ 57.1 to 57.6)

Part 58 - Rear-view Mirrors And Rear Object Detection Devices (§ 58.1 to 58.8)

Part 59 - Reflective Devices Or Materials For Bicycles And In-line Skates (§ 59.1 to 59.15)

Part 60 - Tamper Resistant Odometers (§ 60.1 to 60.7)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
